name: Calligraphy Set: Proper Penmanship
description: Traditional Inazuman brushes, an inkstone, and empty books.\nThe Kamisato Clan traditionally wraps a metal shell around a wooden shaft to create a brush of stunning weight in order to practice their control over the brush nib. Once sufficiently trained in this art, one's handwriting will remain slender and graceful even when penning words on an extremely small piece of paper.
